name: Music History: An Interactive Experience
description:
Need to brush up on your music history? Maybe you just have a thing for old dudes? Perhaps you're just very bored. From the creator of You Have a Band Lesson comes a thrilling tale about music, love, and the meaning of sound

You're a new student at the prestigious Notre Dame School of Music. Prepare to undergo grueling tasks from your teachers, not to mention the awkwardness that comes from making friends!!!

Devnotes: Version 1.1 has been uploaded because I didn't spell check after 14 hours of work yesterday lol
